content:
本件保存七年
C2-62- 1718
June
1,
2
MEMORANDUM
To : Mr. R. L. Hirshberg, Program Officer, US AID/C Fron : C. C. Chang, Chief, Second Division Original signed by C. C. Chang
Subject : Excess Equipment
Project No. X-99-AX (99-471)
Reference is made to the attached Reports of Excess Equipment and copy of JGWhite letter dated May 29, 1962 File Ref. MSA-33.4.
In the above letter, JGwhite recommended that crane shovel and dump trucks be procured. The crane shovel basic unit (GSA Control Number 7-62-1160) and shovel front (GSA Con- trol Number 7-62-1129 ) are to be procured together; if either of them cannot be obtained, the crane shovel complete (GSA Control Number 7-62-1162) is to be procured. If you concur and the listed items are available, please initiate necessary action Zor acquisition and shipment to Taiwan.
Encl. Reports Copy of JGW letter cc: JON BES (with copy of JGW letter) 2D 11 CS/psh
E-76.13. 2
51.3. 100×200
國史馆 Academia Historie
315
